description: Su Espacio Inmobiliaria presents for sale this magnificent corner semi-detached house, located very close to the center of the municipality with all services at hand. The house has an area of 320 square meters distributed over two floors plus an attic located on a 251-meter plot. The main floor consists of a spacious entrance hall, living room/bedroom, fitted and recently renovated kitchen with access to a covered porch and gazebo, laundry room, toilet, pantry and a large separate living room with fireplace and access to the rear garden. Closed garage for one car with automatic door. Going up to the first floor we find 5 large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes in all of them and two complete bathrooms, one of them en suite. The bathroom in the master bedroom has a hydromassage bathtub and a walk-in shower. In the second bathroom it has a shower with a hydromassage column. Both have been completely renovated. Finally, we find a large, completely open-plan loft equipped with casement windows that give natural light and cross ventilation. It has many improvements made, being in perfect condition. To highlight among the improvements is the waterproofing of the roof, completely renovated and with all the slate changed. Electric shutters in many of the rooms. Stoneware and marble floors. White aluminum Climalit windows. Oil heating and air conditioning in several rooms. Outside we find a beautiful and well-kept garden, with automatic irrigation in flower boxes. Covered porch and gazebo awning. Call us and come visit it, you will love it. No purchase commissions. We process your financing to get you the best conditions.
